Html:
All, This may seem a very stupid question but can anyone tell me what languages NAudio currently supports. I have written my application using C# as suggested but just wanted to check what other languages are supported.

Thanks in advance

Mike
you can use NAudio from any .NET language. C# and VB.NET would be the main examples, but F#, managed C++, IronRuby, IronPython etc are also possible.
